events.message: I received the wrong size shirt and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a wrong product size.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the shirt you received to assist with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and I’ve attached a photo showing the wrong size I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the shirt.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund being processed promptly and will send the item back today.
The refund has been successfully processed on our end and the return label sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if everything was satisfactory with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today and I’m very happy with how quickly this was handled. Thank you!
We’re glad everything is resolved. Your refund case is now closed. Feel free to contact us again anytime.
